Name: Secret Pie
About the game: ◆ Story Secret story between the mansion manager and three women ◇ Ian 'The three girls who have the different characters and love in the different worlds.' 'They were so impressed and made me expect the next encounter.' ◇ Airi 'Let's exchange numbers.' 'Huhu, fine. I have a gift for you.' ‘Mr.Ian will know soon I'm getting fond of him…….’ ◇ Mika '.........Don't you really know the name 'Mika'? It's mine.' 'Now, I have a request to Mr. Owner~ hehe!' 'Therefore! The theme of today~! Ta-dadadadadada...........' ◇ Mei '…….' '..... What do you think of me, mister?' '......Sleep here, bro.' ◆ Game Features ◇ Visual novel game. ◇ The game text is 23,000 words. ◇ 3 charming womens. ◇ 3 women full voices.
